description:
The job title is NLP engineer Remote, and the description is as follows: 

This position is an NLP Engineer role, with a focus on data analysis, preprocessing, and developing language models. The engineer must have experience with LLM, NLP, DL, ML, object detection/classification, and tracking. The engineer will be responsible for creating and testing prototypes to identify patterns, trends, and insights to inform model development and improvement. Skills used includes NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.. The skills required for the job are NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.
